alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hidalgo County through 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Carlos Elementary School, or near Edinburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elsa, Memorial Middle School, San Carlos Elementary School, Cesar Chavez, Fountain Center Park, Maria Alicia P Munoz Elementary School, Los Lagos Golf Course, Muniz, Economedes High School and Eisenhower Elementary School. This includes Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 6 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
